question: As part of a student social survey project, you are organising a group to visit a historical exhibition in a small town, Write a letter asking for information regarding such things as the contents of the exhibition, and the dates of its opening and closing, and if there are any discounts available.
text: I am writing to request the information regarding the historical exhibition that is being organised at Darling Habour near Haymarket.

A part of the student social survey project, I am organising a small group of students to visit your exhibition. I need some information related to it. Firstly, could you please let me know what kind of historical items are being exhibited, I noticed that most of the items are handmade and certain items are made by disabled children. Please give me all the details of the articles being exhibited.

Secondly, kindly let me know the opening and closing dates of the exhibition. Finally, as many of the group come from low-level economic backgrounds, they are unable to afford the full price of the ticket. Please let me know if there are any discounts available for school students. Moreover, it would be great if you could let me know beforehand as I need to organise the project.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon.
